EmailTemplate.subject: Feel the Pulse
EmailTemplate.textOnly: June 10, 2021 Feel the Pulse Our exciting new video lets you demo Pulse-Real Time capabilities <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/app?ContentId=45a321df-d9f0-41e0-9327-16de3b5623b6#/doccenter/8ef384b5-b3bb-424b-823f-729a41e48366/doc/%252Fdd196e06dc-3738-d46d-9523-f4780ed862c3%252Flfce8d2444-4b15-4795-9adb-b5a576666db6//?mode=view&parentPath=sessionStorage]]> to your customers, showing them the mobile cloud reporting, alerts, and analytics tool they can use to run their business from any Android or Apple mobile device. All the Information that’s needed is conveniently at their fingertips in the Pulse app to track and monitor everything from up-to-the-minute sales information to notification alerts for issues that require their attention. Access the Pulse demo and other resources on Seismic <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DC3yGjRfDZ4EGTJxbeO1Yjtg]]>. Leveraging Demos for Sweeter Deals In the last issue of eWeekly, we introduced our new Virtual Solution Experience (VSE) <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rdi/ek/va/VSE FINAL 5-18-21.pdf]]>, a dynamic Hospitality sales tool that lets you visually demonstrate to customers in a virtual environment how different personas interact with NCR technology in the restaurant. Now, in our Lokahi podcast <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCakd7e_xK1EmUjIYZUKSTSw]]> Scott Wakeley discusses the power of how you can leverage demos to shape your sales pitch and address specific business challenges. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Knowledge is Power It’s important that customers always have the information they need to keep their business running smoothly. The best way to stay informed about Aloha is to subscribe to the Aloha Status Page <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com/]]>. We need your help in ensuring all your customers subscribe to this free service to minimize support calls that can be addressed easily via the Aloha status alerts that customers receive via text, email, or RSS feed.
